title: Average retail price for white sugar in Canada 2015 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Average retail price in CAD have risen.
Month May had the maximum Average retail price in CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Average retail price in CAD was observed in Month Jul for 2019.
There is a gap of 28.0 between the highest and lowest Average retail price in CAD found for 2017 in Month May and Nov.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Average retail price in CAD have risen.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Average retail price in CAD have risen.
Month May had the maximum Average retail price in CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Average retail price in CAD was observed in Month Jul for 2019.
There is a gap of 28.0 between the highest and lowest Average retail price in CAD found for 2017 in Month May and Nov.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in CAD for both 2017 and 2016 have risen.
Out of all 5 groups, 2017 had the highest Average retail price in CAD for Month May and 2019 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD for Month Jul.
For Month May, 2017 had the highest Average retail price in CAD among all 12 Months and it has the lowest Average retail price in CAD in Month Nov.
Month May and Nov had the biggest gap of 28.0 between the highest and lowest Average retail price in CAD found for 2017.
Among all 5 groups, 2016 had the gap of 260.0 between the maximum and minimum Average retail price in CAD observed in Month Aug and Sep respectively.

In case of Month May, 2017 had the highest Average retail price in CAD 294.0 among the 5 groups and in Jul, 2019 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD 25.0. The second highest Average retail price in CAD 271.0 was observed for 2017 in Month May.
On average, the Month Jan had the highest Average retail price in CAD for all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Dec had the lowest average Average retail price in CAD.
